meta.description: Rev. Franklin Graham is an advocate for telling Christians to take the COVID-19 vaccine. Graham recently revealed in an interview that he has taken the vaccine.

title: Franklin Graham: Jesus Would Have Taken the Covid-19 Vaccine
cleaned_text:
8-Year-Old Dies 3 Times, Wakes Up & Says “Jesus Told Me I Have to Go Back to Earth to Tell Others About Him”

"I know I'm doing it for Jesus. I know that he's real," said Landon. "I know that angels are there. I know that there's a heaven. I'm not doing it for someone I don't know or that I've never seen. I've seen Jesus. I know he's there. He's asked me to do this and this is what I'm doing."

opengraph.title: Franklin Graham: Jesus Would Have Taken the Covid-19 Vaccine
opengraph.description: Rev. Franklin Graham is an advocate for telling Christians to take the COVID-19 vaccine. Graham recently revealed in an interview that he has taken the vaccine.
